James Simpson front end programmer

Mammoth Mountain - Stories

A promotional site for Mammoth Mountain where the community can share stories of their experiences at the ski area. I completed the design to HTML/CSS/HTML implementation.
Posted on 11 November 2013.

EPL Mate

keeping Americans informed of the 2013-2014 English Preimer Leauge Schedule

With the 2013/14 League NBC is offering unprecedented coverage on its networks and online. Never before has the US had such access to the live matches from the premiere football league in the world. EPL Mate is a simple tool to put the upcoming EPL Schedule always within sight. Including Desktop Notifications when coverage begins for your Club.
Posted on 02 October 2013.

Mi Deal Shop

Mi Deal Shop aggregates sales from a handful of online retailers. Recently updated with an AngularJS driven front end from a previous custom single page implementation of my own. Responsive layouts based on Twitter Bootstrap with support down to mobile phones.
Posted on 13 July 2013.

Footlocker - Colors That Run

A promotional site for Footlocker's Colors That Run promotion with ASICS. I completed the PSD to HTML/CS/JS conversion.
Posted on 11 June 2013.

A promotional site for Lady Footlocker's Colors that Run promotion with ASICS. I completed the PSD to HTML/CS/JS conversion.
